name: story of a mask #3
description:
koyung artwork / story of a mask series / colorfull JPG /
A mask is an object that is worn over the face. Usually the mask used to accompany the music of local arts. Masks in regional arts are generally to honor gods or clarify character in accompanying art. There are various forms of masks, some depicting angry characters, some depicting gentleness, and some depicting wisdom.
Masks have become one of the oldest forms of expression ever created by human civilization. In most of the world's societies, masks play an important role in various aspects of life that hold magical and sacred values. This is because of the great role of masks as special symbols in various noble ceremonies and traditional activities.
